name: Money
description: Intergalactic currency. Good for buying things. Did you see that there's an arcade at Blips and Chitz?
success_message: Let's play Roy: A Life Well Lived. It's my favorite game here -- you live an entire life as Roy, a simple man living a simple life. All your failed hopes and dreams, you-you-you*URPPP* you can do whatever you want! See, watch your Grandpa: what shoud we do? Take your life off the grid! Go ham! I've got no social security number and no worries! Haha! Sweet -- let's look and see what we won.
failure_messages: What are you even trying to do Morty, money won't buy you anything other than fame, privilege, and probably a decent chance at global power. Shockingly, this is one of the few cases where money won't help us.
M-m-m-morty. Put the money away. If anyone gets their peepers on our schmeckles we might get mugged faster than Beth goes through wine.
Morty, put that away for when your grandpa needs a refill of the ol' flasky flask. That's far more important.
